thread.title: Crossover: Xi to visit Manchester City football club
thread.title_full: Crossover: Xi to visit Manchester City football club

title: Crossover: Xi to visit Manchester City football club
text:
Full coverage: President Xi Visits UK 
Chinese President Xi Jinping will be visiting Manchester City football, fitting for a man who has claimed his love of the beautiful game. After three days of banquets, processions and trade talks, Xi Jinping will meet players who helped build the city's footballing legacy and watch a women's match between Manchester and Wuhan. For more on President Xi's visit, we are joined by Richard Bestic who is in Manchester now. 
Q1 Richard, thanks for joining us. My first thought, was why is the Chinese President on a state visit to the UK, visiting a football ground? 
Q2 How can co-operation between the two countries improve the level of play on the football field? 
Q3 What is it about Manchester City's football system in particular that is so attractive to Chinese football officials? Related Videos
